iati-activity.title: Feasibility study of the education and TVET sector in Malawi
iati-activity.description: The objective of this assignment is to undertake a feasibility study of the education sector in Malawi, focusing on how EU support can best strengthen the sector and its responsiveness to labour market needs for relevant vocational, technical and professional skills, thereby contributing to improved employement levels, economic growth and poverty reduction.

contact-info.organisation: Delegation of the European Union to Malawi

location.description: Experts will be based in Lilongwe, but with mission across Malawi.
